title: Layered Melon and Smoked Sable with Ginger Emulsion
directions: Finely grate enough ginger to measure 1 tablespoon. Pur√©e ginger, oil, and lime juice in a blender until smooth and emulsified. Transfer to a small bowl.
Arrange sable slices in 1 layer on a tray and brush with some of ginger emulsion.
Halve melon lengthwise, then seed and peel. Cut 12 (1/8-inch-thick) lengthwise slices of melon.
